reviews.review: Counter Strike Global Ofensive, para muchos este juego es una mierda para mi también, pero no es tan así, ya que el counter me dio amigos y sueños frustrados, así que me parece un buen juego pero la verdad ella es fanática de lo sensual, ella tiene una foto mía.
官匹挂还是有点难控制，剩下的好评，就是竞技性太高，对新手十分不友好

El juego me parece espectacular, requiere de incontables horas de práctica intentar ser bueno, mucha gente juega hace mucho tiempo asique complica mucho la curva de aprendizaje para los nuevos, estaría bueno que haya un mejor sistema de emparejamiento que el MM, y mayor control en "Compañero", usan hacks sin escrúpulo. Lo recomiendo totalmente para pasar ratos con amigos

Ok so, I'm gonna say I recommend this however I don't particularly play it as much anymore, there is quite a high skill ceiling I personally feel and I haven't played any of that new expansion thing, from personal experience I am not a huge fan of this game but I could easily recommend it to be people would are really into Shooters or people who just like competitive games though the community can be really toxic you can also find some pretty awesome people.

I think this game is alot of fun when you play with friends or have a look on the workshop but to be honest that and casual is the only fun I have anymore, I recommend this to anyone who DEFINITELY has friends to play with or people who like competitive games or Shooters

Gameplay repetitiva, jogabilidade porca, gráficos bons e uma comunidade tóxica. Um dos jogos mais vendidos da Valve e mais jogados da Steam, stonks.

This game has so many problems that they refuse to fix, and want people to spend money so that players don't run into cheaters every single game you go into. Other than that, I still find myself playing with friends who won't let it die in their hearts. *sigh*

Извините конечно, но это уже не игра а помойка какая то! После последнего обновления от 05.05.20 игра в принципе, то вылетает, или как у меня сейчас вообще не запускает! Я перепробовал уже все, даже переустанавливал Windows, но игра мне кажется умерла, уже не о чем говорить не надо! Ведь все мы прекрасно знаем, то на сколько качественные обновления делает VALVE!
